casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Fredrick D. GIBBS. No. 279P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. James R. Glover, Chapel Hill, for Gibbs, Fredrick D. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Gibbs, Fredrick D. Richard A. Graham, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Martin T. McCracken, Raleigh, for State of North Carolina. Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of September 2015 by State of NC to Deem Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
